name: Secrets and certificates
description: Manage secrets and certificates used by APIM policies and backend connectivity.
topics: Named values: store configuration used in policies; avoid embedding secrets in policy XML.
Certificate lifecycle: issuance, rotation, and storage; define ownership and renewal automation.
Mutual TLS (mTLS): define client cert requirements and backend cert validation approach.
nextSteps: Inventory all secrets/certs needed for auth, backend calls, and integrations.
Decide how rotation is handled and how changes are deployed safely.
